remarks: From a surjective function, *choose* a subset of the domain, such that the restricted function is bijective.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Jan-2020.)
statement:
foresf1o $p |- ( ( A e. V /\ F : A -onto-> B ) -> E. x e. ~P A ( F |` x ) : x -1-1-onto-> B ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
